To be eligible to receive GMAT scores, you must be an accredited, degree-granting institution that offers graduate-level programs in business and management.

The list below contains the universities, fellowships, and scholarship organizations that either accept or require GMAT scores for admission to their programs.

Find out more about becoming a GMAT Score Recipient to join the growing list of more than 2,400 universities and organizations below.

You may search for a specific university/institution or use the alphabet navigation to filter the list.

VIEW: All | By Region: | By Country/Region:

SEARCH: Search Clear

SORT BY: University/School | Country/Region
